p: Starch can be used as a food packaging material and often acts as a thickener, adhesive or additive. Starch has the advantage of being a moderate oil barrier, but it is weak in a moist environment because of the hydrophilic function groups in its molecular structure. Its crystalline region can form a parclose against outside gases, and the effect becomes stronger for amylose films than for amylopectin ones [ 36].
